resources.string: Your service provider does not support disabling call forwarding when your phone is busy.

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage. *At least one greeting must be recorded before use."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage."

"Answering Machine differs from %s. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage. At least one greeting must be recorded before use."

*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage."
the voicemail service provided by your operator
Note that microphone noise suppression works only when you talk directly in the phone, not when you use the speaker or a headset.

"If you skip activation, you can't place calls or connect to mobile data networks, though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks. Until you activate your phone, you are asked to activate it each time you turn it on."
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.
"A SIM card has activated your service and updated your phone's roaming capabilities."

"To update your Preferred Roaming List (PRL), you must log in to your account at au Customer Support. (You will be redirected to the page.) Additional data charges may apply depending on your data plan."
To update your Preferred Roaming List (PRL), call *5050 (toll free).
